formatDescription: Pro Tools is a digital audio workstation software application developed by AVID Technology. A Pro Tools session file contains the configuration of a Pro Tools session including settings, plugin details, references to audio and midi tracks etc. Pro Tools Session files do not contain audio data directly.

internalSignatures.name: Pro Tools Session File 5-9
internalSignatures.note: BOF; Offset: 0; Bytes: 0x03, ASCII “0010111100101011” {1} 0x01 – this is based on information from the ‘ptformat’ Pro Tools file format parser - https://github.com/zamaudio/ptformat/blob/master/ptformat.cc#L402
